member.summary: Enable capture of properties from the ILogger-State-object, both in and

member.summary: Use the NLog engine for parsing the message template (again) and format using the NLog formatter

member.summary: Enable capture of scope information and inject into

member.summary: Shutdown NLog on dispose of the

member.name: P:NLog.Extensions.Logging.NLogProviderOptions.AutoShutdown
member.summary: Automatically Shutdown NLog on AppDomain.Unload or AppDomain.ProcessExit

member.name: P:NLog.Extensions.Logging.NLogProviderOptions.IncludeActivityIdsWithBeginScope
member.summary: Automatically include Activity.SpanId, Activity.TraceId and Activity.ParentId.
member.remarks:
Intended for Net5.0 where these properties are no longer included by default for performance reasons
Consider using ${activity} as alternative

member.summary: See for documentation

member.name: P:NLog.Extensions.Logging.NLogProviderOptions.ReplaceLoggerFactory
member.summary: Replace Microsoft LoggerFactory with a pure , and disables Microsoft Filter Logic and removes other LoggingProviders.

member.name: P:NLog.Extensions.Logging.NLogProviderOptions.LoggingConfigurationSectionName
member.summary: Checks the Host Configuration for the specified section-name, and tries to load NLog-LoggingConfiguration after creation of NLogLoggerProvider
member.remarks: Will only attempt to load NLog-LoggingConfiguration if valid section-name, and NLog-LoggingConfiguration has not been loaded already.
